auth.loginFailed: Login failed. Please check your email and password.

auth.homeTownHint: Optional - helps connect you with your community

help.title: Nubian Family Tree
help.subtitle: Preserve your heritage. Connect your generations.
help.whatIsDescription: The Nubian Family Tree platform helps you build, explore, and share your family history. Document your ancestors, connect with relatives, and preserve your Nubian heritage for future generations.
help.step1Description: Register with your name, email, and a password.
help.step2Description: Optionally choose your Nubian hometown to connect with your local community and family trees.
help.step3Description: The platform supports English, Arabic, and Nobiin. You can change this anytime.
help.step4Description: Browse existing trees, add people, upload photos, and discover family connections.
help.registrationDescription: To create an account you will need:
help.regFieldHometown: Your hometown (optional - helps match you with local trees)
help.signIn: Already have an account? Sign In

dashboard.noTreesMessage: Create your first family tree to start adding family members and building your lineage.
dashboard.noTreesUserMessage: Browse available family trees in your town to explore family histories and suggest relationships.
dashboard.featuresBannerMessage: Start by adding family members and building your family tree.
dashboard.noTreesInTown: No family trees available in this town yet.

people.addFirst: Add your first family member to get started

relationship.unionDesc: These two people are married or partners
relationship.onlyDirectCanEdit: Only direct relationships can be edited
relationship.noPathFoundMessage: These individuals don't appear to be related in this family tree. They may be in different family branches.

OVERVIEW.TITLE: Welcome to FamilyTree!
OVERVIEW.INTRO: FamilyTree helps you explore and document your family history across the Nubian region.
OVERVIEW.FEATURE_1: Browse family trees in your town
OVERVIEW.FEATURE_3: Explore photos and media of family members
OVERVIEW.FEATURE_5: Switch between English, Arabic, and Nobiin languages

ONBOARDING.TITLE: Getting Started
ONBOARDING.INTRO: Follow these steps to set up your account and start exploring.
ONBOARDING.STEP1_DESC: Choose your preferred language for the interface. You can change this anytime from your profile.
ONBOARDING.STEP2_DESC: Select the town you want to browse. This determines which family trees you can view.
ONBOARDING.STEP3_DESC: Browse available family trees and start discovering your family connections.

DASHBOARD.TITLE: Dashboard Overview
DASHBOARD.INTRO: Your dashboard is the central hub for accessing family trees in your selected town.
DASHBOARD.STATS_DESC: View the number of people, families, and trees in your town at a glance.
DASHBOARD.TREES_DESC: See all available family trees in your town. Click on any tree to explore it.
DASHBOARD.CHANGE_TOWN_DESC: Use the town selector in the header to switch to a different town.

TREES.TITLE: Browsing Family Trees
TREES.INTRO: Family trees show the relationships between people in a family lineage.
TREES.VIEW_DESC: Click on any family tree card to open and explore it.
TREES.SEARCH_DESC: Use the search bar to find specific family trees by name.
TREES.FILTER_DESC: Filter trees by town to narrow your search.

PEOPLE.TITLE: Browsing People
PEOPLE.INTRO: The People section shows all family members in the current tree.
PEOPLE.SEARCH_DESC: Search by name in English, Arabic, or Nobiin script.
PEOPLE.FILTER_DESC: Filter by gender, living/deceased status, or other criteria.
PEOPLE.PROFILE_DESC: Click on a person to see their full profile, including relationships and photos.

TREE_VIEW.TITLE: Tree Visualization
TREE_VIEW.INTRO: The interactive tree view shows family relationships in a visual format.
TREE_VIEW.ZOOM_IN: Use + button or scroll to zoom in
TREE_VIEW.ZOOM_OUT: Use - button or scroll to zoom out
TREE_VIEW.PAN: Click and drag to move around the tree
TREE_VIEW.FIT_SCREEN: Click 'Fit' to see the entire tree
TREE_VIEW.HOURGLASS: Hourglass - Shows both ancestors and descendants
TREE_VIEW.CLICK_PERSON: Click on any person to see their details or navigate to them.

MEDIA.TITLE: Media Gallery
MEDIA.INTRO: View photos, documents, and other media associated with family members.
MEDIA.BROWSE_DESC: Scroll through the gallery to see all available media.
MEDIA.FILTER_DESC: Filter to show only images, documents, or other media types.
MEDIA.VIEW_DESC: Click on any item to see it in full size with details.

SUGGESTIONS.TITLE: Making Suggestions
SUGGESTIONS.INTRO: Help improve the family tree by suggesting new relationships or corrections.
SUGGESTIONS.HOW_DESC: Your suggestions are reviewed by administrators before being added to the tree.
SUGGESTIONS.TYPE_PARENT: Add Parent - Suggest a parent for someone
SUGGESTIONS.TYPE_CHILD: Add Child - Suggest a child for someone
SUGGESTIONS.TYPE_SPOUSE: Add Spouse - Suggest a marriage or partnership

PROFILE.TITLE: Your Profile
PROFILE.INTRO: Manage your account settings and preferences.
PROFILE.LANGUAGE_DESC: Change your preferred language for the application.
PROFILE.TOWN_DESC: Change which town you are currently browsing.

TIPS.TITLE: Tips & Best Practices
TIPS.TIP1_DESC: Search for people using any script - English, Arabic, or Nobiin.
TIPS.TIP2_DESC: Use the relationship finder to discover how two people are connected.
TIPS.TIP3_DESC: Provide detailed rationale and sources when suggesting relationships.
TIPS.TIP4_DESC: Many people have names in multiple scripts - check all variations.
TIPS.TIP5_DESC: Install the app for offline access to previously viewed content.

OVERVIEW.TITLE: Admin Overview
OVERVIEW.INTRO: As an administrator, you can manage family trees and data for your assigned towns.
OVERVIEW.RESP_1: Manage family trees in your assigned towns
OVERVIEW.RESP_2: Add and edit people and relationships

TOWNS.TITLE: Town Management
TOWNS.INTRO: You can manage family trees within your assigned towns.
TOWNS.ASSIGNED_DESC: View and switch between towns assigned to you by SuperAdmin.
TOWNS.SWITCH_DESC: Use the town selector in the header to switch between your assigned towns.

TREES.TITLE: Tree Management
TREES.INTRO: Create and manage family trees within your assigned towns.
TREES.CREATE_DESC: Click 'New Tree' to create a new family tree. Each tree must belong to a town.
TREES.SETTINGS_DESC: Configure tree visibility, cross-tree linking, and other options.
TREES.MEMBERS_DESC: Invite users to collaborate on a tree with different permission levels.

PEOPLE.TITLE: People Management
PEOPLE.INTRO: Add and edit family members within your trees.
PEOPLE.ADD_DESC: Click 'Add Person' to create a new family member. Fill in names in all available languages.
PEOPLE.EDIT_DESC: Click on a person and use the edit button to modify their information.
PEOPLE.NAMES_DESC: Enter names in English, Arabic, and Nobiin for better searchability.

RELATIONSHIPS.TITLE: Relationship Management
RELATIONSHIPS.INTRO: Manage family relationships including parent-child and marriage connections.
RELATIONSHIPS.ADD_DESC: Use the 'Add Parent', 'Add Child', or 'Add Spouse' buttons on a person's profile.
RELATIONSHIPS.PENDING_DESC: Review and approve cross-tree relationship links in the Pending Links section.

SUGGESTIONS.TITLE: Suggestion Queue
SUGGESTIONS.INTRO: Review and process suggestions submitted by users.
SUGGESTIONS.QUEUE_DESC: View all pending suggestions for your assigned towns.
SUGGESTIONS.ACTION_APPROVE: Approve - Accept and apply the suggestion
SUGGESTIONS.ACTION_INFO: Request Info - Ask for more details
SUGGESTIONS.BEST_PRACTICE: Always provide feedback when rejecting to help users improve future suggestions.

MEDIA.TITLE: Media Management
MEDIA.INTRO: Upload and manage photos and documents for family members.
MEDIA.UPLOAD_DESC: Click 'Upload' on a person's profile to add photos or documents.
MEDIA.TAG_DESC: Tag multiple people in shared photos to link them together.
MEDIA.PRIMARY_DESC: Set a primary photo that will be shown as the person's avatar.

TREE_VIEW.TITLE: Tree Visualization
TREE_VIEW.INTRO: Advanced tree view features for administrators.
TREE_VIEW.EDIT_MODE: Edit directly in the tree view by clicking on people.
TREE_VIEW.QUICK_ADD: Use quick-add buttons to add relatives directly from the tree.

USERS.TITLE: User Management
USERS.INTRO: Manage users and their access to trees in your towns.
USERS.INVITE_DESC: Invite users to collaborate on specific trees with assigned roles.
USERS.ROLE_VIEWER: Viewer - Can only view the tree

TIPS.TITLE: Admin Tips
TIPS.TIP1_DESC: Always verify suggestion sources and rationale before approving.
TIPS.TIP2_DESC: Use the auto-transliterate feature to generate names in all scripts.
TIPS.TIP3_DESC: Use consistent naming conventions and date formats across the tree.
TIPS.TIP4_DESC: Add notes about information sources for future reference.

OVERVIEW.TITLE: SuperAdmin Overview
OVERVIEW.INTRO: As SuperAdmin, you have full control over the entire platform.
OVERVIEW.CAP_1: Manage all towns and family trees

ADMIN_PANEL.TITLE: Admin Panel
ADMIN_PANEL.INTRO: The central hub for platform administration.
ADMIN_PANEL.USERS_TAB: Users Tab - Manage all platform users
ADMIN_PANEL.ASSIGNMENTS_TAB: Assignments Tab - Assign admins to towns
ADMIN_PANEL.TREES_TAB: Trees Tab - View all family trees

COUNTRIES.TITLE: Countries Management
COUNTRIES.INTRO: Manage the list of countries used throughout the platform.
COUNTRIES.ADD_DESC: Add new countries with codes, names in multiple languages, and regions.
COUNTRIES.EDIT_DESC: Update country information or mark countries as inactive.

TOWNS.TITLE: Town Management
TOWNS.INTRO: Manage all towns across the platform.
TOWNS.CREATE_DESC: Add new towns with names in English, Arabic, and local script.
TOWNS.ASSIGN_DESC: Assign administrators to manage specific towns.

CAROUSEL.TITLE: Carousel Images
CAROUSEL.ADD_DESC: Upload images for the town selection page carousel.
CAROUSEL.ORDER_DESC: Drag and drop to reorder carousel images.

TOWN_IMAGES.TITLE: Town Images
TOWN_IMAGES.INTRO: Manage gallery images for each town.
TOWN_IMAGES.UPLOAD_DESC: Add images specific to each town for display in town pages.
TOWN_IMAGES.ORGANIZE_DESC: Set titles and descriptions for better organization.

USERS.TITLE: User Management
USERS.CREATE_DESC: Create new users and assign their system role.
USERS.ROLE_USER: User - Regular user with limited access
USERS.ASSIGN_DESC: Assign admins to specific towns they will manage.

SUGGESTIONS.TITLE: Global Suggestions
SUGGESTIONS.INTRO: View and manage suggestions across all towns.
SUGGESTIONS.FILTER_DESC: Filter suggestions by town, status, or type.
SUGGESTIONS.GLOBAL_VIEW: Unlike admins, you can see suggestions from all towns.

BULK_OPS.TITLE: Bulk Operations
BULK_OPS.TRANSLITERATION_DESC: Generate missing name transliterations for people across the platform.
BULK_OPS.REVIEW_DESC: Review and verify low-confidence name transliterations.
BULK_OPS.WARNING: Bulk operations can affect many records. Always review before confirming.

TIPS.TITLE: SuperAdmin Tips
TIPS.TIP1_DESC: Regularly review admin activity and suggestion processing.
TIPS.TIP2_DESC: Ensure regular backups of the platform database.
TIPS.TIP3_DESC: Track platform statistics to plan for scaling.
TIPS.TIP4_DESC: Ensure admins understand best practices for data management.

treeDiagram.loadError: Failed to load root persons. Please try again.
treeDiagram.noRootPersonsHint: This tree doesn't have any people without recorded parents yet.
